name: Inverted (itch) (HardEggGames)
description:
Inverted is a color based platforming puzzle game. In this game, only two colors dictate how things interact.  You can customize which colors you'd like to see in the game too! This game was created for the United Game Jam.

Oh No! Blob has been locked out of his house! Help him solve a series of color based puzzles  so he can enter into his own house and get a good nights sleep.

Controls:

A W - Move

Space - Jump

Click - interact / pick up
